ygData.subject: Temple of Solusek Ro
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm bet I can guess what the new quests are like.  Here s a sample: Aloro: Hail, Wethyl Stringplucker! Wethyl: Hail, Aloro.  Can you help me?  I have need of
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm bet I can guess what the new quests are like. Here's a sample:

Aloro: Hail, Wethyl Stringplucker!
Wethyl: Hail, Aloro. Can you help me? I have need of some [special picks].
Aloro: What special picks?
Wethyl: In order to perform my latest composition I need only the finest
quality picks. [Sylia Windlehands] in Kelethin stole my last one.
Aloro: <looking nervously around> You mean the bard guildmistress there?
The one who trained me in the fundamentals of music?
Wethyl:
Aloro: What do you want from Sylia Windlehands?
Wethyl: Slay her and bring me the pick she carries. I will make it well
worth your time.
Aloro: Listen, Wethyl, thanks and all, but 1) Sylia is a friend of mine, and
2) I already have a mandolin. Push off, you sick monkey!

OK, ok, I am a trifle cynical, but we'll see. = P

Aloro Silvertongue (E'ci)
